channel.title: Need help despretly with compile
channel.description:
well im just getting a error all time here it is below
why the hell do you need antirandoms on a private server? 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
then i get another 1
C:\Documents and Settings\Admin>javac *.java 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
C:\Documents and Settings\Admin>pause Press any key to continue . . .
thts all i get all time can you please help me with it all i need to do is compile

item.title: Need help despretly with compile
item.dc:creator: @dracar dracar
item.description:
@dracar wrote:

hmm i always got that error and i figured out how to fix it… what i did was just change the javac line to sumthin like this, idk the exact path i had it at…

"c:\sun\...\...\javac.exe" *.java

try that with ur compiler, just type in the path that javac is in, it shud be in a folder called bin or sumthin

or, my problem was that i had to define hte location of javac, this is the fix i ended up using… open control panel, system, advanced, enviromental variables there should be a variable called path in ur user list, just set it to ur javac location, like mine is “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0\bin” i dont think u need the second one but i wanted to be sure it wud work

Read full topic

item.title: Need help despretly with compile
item.dc:creator: @Zaroyn Zaroyn
item.description:
@Zaroyn wrote:

put all of you .java files into a single folder inside of the one that has your other server stuff in it

Read full topic
